PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-03522014-04-03,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  CPC,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Mail Receptacles Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MAIL RECEPTACLES REGULATIONS in order to (1) require rural mail boxes to be securely fastened to a fixed post only; (2) stipulate that the distance between the bottom of a rural mail box and the ground immediately below it must be at least 105 but not more than 115 cm; (3) update the dimensional specifications for mail and parcel boxes utilized for apartment buildings and office complexes; and (4) permit the installation of parcel boxes either inside or outside apartment buildings and office complexes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/
AttachmentsAttachment
